name: The Locked Toybox
description:
Rumors of ghosts at Benjie’s Toys got the better of your friend’s curiosity, and no one has seen her since. You’ve decided to go find her yourself. 

The Locked Toybox is a puzzle escape room. Play chess, solve light and shadow challenges, and try to escape before the clock runs out, and the ghost claims another victim…

Created for Global Game Jam with pigsquad.com - a team effort by:

Michael Lee - Programming and Project Management - https://globalgamejam.org/users/psydshobob

Arthur Littlefield - Programming and Puzzle Design - https://globalgamejam.org/users/primitivetype

Shane - Programming and Art - https://globalgamejam.org/users/atticboy

https://itch.io/profile/atticboy

Corrin Coffey - Music and Sound Effects - https://globalgamejam.org/users/corrincoffey

Titania Daildon - Writing and Design - https://globalgamejam.org/users/titania-baildon

https://emperorrampage.itch.io/beat-cannon

Sonya Neunzert - Modeling and Design - https://globalgamejam.org/users/sonya-n

Autumn Rizzo - Toy Concept Sketches and Writing
